articles.title: Huawei MatePad 11.5 review: iPad rival that's missing a trick
articles.author: Tech Advisor
articles.summary: Huawei launched the MatePad for 2025, targetting students and professionals and featuring a matt display, M-Pencil stylus, and extended battery life. The tablet includes HarmonyOS, GoPaint, and Notes app, aiming for a competitive experience but lacking Google services and having limited app availability.

articles.title: Cornerstone Insurance unveils AI chatbot
articles.author: Oluwakemi Abimbola
articles.summary: Cornerstone Insurance has launched Cici, an AI-powered chatbot, at its Lagos headquarters. Cici is designed to improve customer experience and operational efficiency by helping customers buy insurance policies and assist with claims. The chatbot is available on multiple platforms, providing fast, accurate, and personalized interactions.

articles.title: Samsung unveils AI TV
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Samsung Vision AI TV, a next-generation television that combines artificial intelligence with privacy-first features. The new television will serve as a hub for smart living, content interaction and home integration, while protecting personal data with Samsung Knox security technology. The 2025 TV lineup delivers advanced viewing experience and intelligent home features.

articles.title: Downy Wrinkle Release Spray Is an Affordable Steamer Alternative
articles.author: Alyssa Grabinski
articles.summary: Downy has a Wrinkle Releaser Spray. The spray functions as a steamer, static-eliminator, and scent-booster in a single bottle, removing wrinkles in seconds. The product is available in different sizes and is being sold on Amazon.

articles.title: AgiBot kicks off humanoid robot sales as commercialization gains momentum
articles.author: Ma Tong
articles.summary: AgiBot is launching its full product lineup, including the OmniHand and Shangqing Juechen C5, on e-commerce platforms. Zhiyuan Innovation's Expedition A2-W robots are being deployed, and SquareBot and UBtech have received significant orders for their robots. These developments signal the increasing commercial adoption and market competition in China's robotics industry.

articles.title: 35 TikTok Products You Won't Just Like, But Like Like
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Lottabody introduced a Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for frizz control and defined curls. Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set with cleaning paste. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, collagen peptides, vitamin E, and shea butter. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara featuring innovative "tubing" technology.

articles.title: 47 Products So Fun That You'll Feel Like A Little Kid
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Nyx has introduced the "Smushy" Matte Lip Balm, made with mochi rice powder. This buildable, moisturizing lip balm provides a natural look and comes in flavors like cherry pie and raspberry sorbet.

articles.title: Best Samsung phones 2020: Galaxy S, Note, A and Z compared
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung offers a variety of smartphones, including flagship Galaxy Z folding models and the latest Galaxy S and Galaxy Note ranges.

articles.title: â€˜Makes my life so much easier', people cry over â‚¬24.99 Aldi Ireland buy that cleans stubborn dirt from windows & mirrors
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched the Ambiano Electric Window Cleaner, priced at â‚¬24.99, a 12W cleaning device with a spraying mechanism, vacuum, and squeegee designed for streak-free finishes on windows and mirrors. They are also selling Ride+Go Cordless Car Vacuum for â‚¬16.99 which is designed to keep your car sparkling clean as it can solve residual dust in the corners and crevices of your car.

articles.title: Debenhams' best-selling mattress topper that's 'like a cloud' now on sale
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering the Ezysleek thick super soft mattress topper with up to 36% off. Simba offers a hybrid mattress topper with foam and titanium alloy micro springs. Emma offers a flip topper with a firm and soft side to cater to preference and is available in multiple sizes.

articles.title: Best Google Pixel 5 cases 2020: Protect your Google flagship
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 5 aims to provide a pure Android experience.

articles.title: EV shuttle system rollsout in Camp John Hay
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Camp John Hay launched a new electric vehicle. This represents the introduction of a new product by the company.

articles.title: 4 reasons I'm sticking with Windows 10 â€” even after support ends
articles.author: Mauro Huculak
articles.summary: Microsoft is offering the Extended Security Update (ESU) program for Windows 10 users who want to continue receiving security updates after the official end of support. The ESU program provides critical updates for a fee of $30 or 1000 Microsoft Rewards points and maintains the device's security until October 2026. Users can enroll through Windows Update settings.

articles.title: 30 Boring Products You'll Love
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid, hyaluronic acid, and jojoba oil. Monday Haircare introduced dry shampoo with a gardenia scent. Bissell released the Little Green upholstery cleaner, effective for pet stains and spills.

articles.title: 31 Clever Ways To Address Outdoor Eyesores
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Grampa's Gardenware Co., a family-owned business, offers a long-handled standing weeder with a bamboo handle and powder-coated steel for easy weeding. Drill Brush, a small business, provides drill-attachable cleaning brushes in various colors for different surfaces, designed for ease of use. Sunnydaze, specializing in outdoor home goods, sells a firewood rack with a protective cover to keep logs organized and protected.

articles.title: Boots Â£85 'floral' perfume - and one fan said 'I always get complimented on it'
articles.author: Robson Mccallister
articles.summary: Boots is selling the EstÃ©e Lauder Modern Muse Eau de Parfum Spray 50ml for Â£85. The perfume, containing sparkling jasmine and sleek woods, has received positive reviews for its fresh and floral scent. The product is available on the Boots website.

articles.title: 46 Amazon Items That You'll Want To Add To Your Cart
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30. The Pink Stuff introduced new "Sqeezy" sponge set. First Aid Beauty released Facial Radiance Pads, a set of compostable beauty prep pads. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. NeeDoh released "Dream Drop". Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash. Mielle launched Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. Aloderma launched Organic Aloe Vera Gel. Nyx introduced Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum. Elizavecca launched hair treatment. E.l.f. launched Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer. Ocusoft launched Lid Scrub Pads. Oxo launched compact Brew Rapid Brewer.

articles.title: Amazon analysts turn heads with surprising take on grocery plan
articles.author: Rob Lenihan
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its same-day delivery service to include fresh groceries in over 1,000 cities and aims to reach more than 2,300 cities by the end of the year. Amazon Prime members receive free same-day delivery on orders of $25 or more, positioning Amazon more competitively against grocery retailers like Walmart and Instacart.

articles.title: Milkmaid leans on legacy, but misses the fun in latest TV commercial
articles.author: Gaurav Laghate
articles.summary: NestlÃ© Milkmaid has launched a new TV commercial (TVC) conceptualized by BBH India and directed by filmmaker Ram Madhvani, marking yet another addition to the brand's long-running storytelling about home-made desserts and family joy. The ad also introduces a new reusable pack, smartly highlighting convenience for today's households.

articles.title: Oppo A5 launched in Bangladesh
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the Oppo A5 (6GB+128GB) in Bangladesh. The device features a 1,000-nit ultra-bright display, IP65 water and dust resistance, and is powered by a 6,000mAh battery with 45W SUPERVOOC Flash Charge. The Oppo A5 includes a 50 MP main camera, a 2 MP depth sensor, a 5 MP AI selfie camera, and is priced at BDT 19,990.

articles.title: Amazon rolls out new shopping service to rival Temu and Shein and it's 70% off everything today
articles.author: Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its new shopping service, "Haul," as a rival to Shein and Temu. Haul offers shoppers thousands of products for Â£20 or less, with a launch day sale offering 70% off everything. The service is currently available on mobile and offers free delivery on orders over Â£15.

articles.title: If You Wanna Feel Like An Adult, Get These 26 Products
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of products designed to address common issues faced by young adults. These include the Pink Stuff cleaner for household stains, the ChomChom pet hair remover, Paris Hilton coupe glasses, wine drops for headaches, grocery bag carrier from Shark Tank, Wet n Forget Shower Cleaner, compression socks, the We're Not Really Strangers card game, a Tree of Life retinol serum and Supergoop Unseen Sunscreen. The products aim to improve various aspects of daily life, from cleaning and home decor to health, beauty and social interactions.

articles.title: Parallel, the AI-first web platform from ex-Twitter CEO, aims to outperform GPT-5
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Parag Agrawal, former Twitter CEO, launched Parallel, an AI startup, which is building a platform for AI to efficiently search and understand the web. Parallel launched its Deep Research API, which the company claims has already outperformed humans and leading AI models like GPT-5 on key research tasks. Parallel has secured $30 million in funding from firms like Khosla Ventures, Index Ventures, and First Round Capital.

articles.title: 56 Products For Anyone Who Longs To Have A Clean, Organized Home
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article highlights several new cleaning and organizing products designed for home use. These include items like the Levoit air purifier with smart features, the Chom Chom pet hair remover, and a variety of cleaning solutions and tools from brands like Dawn, Rubbermaid, and Scrub Daddy, all aimed at improving cleanliness and organization.

articles.title: How a structural shift by tech companies is allowing AI to act autonomously and without oversight
articles.author: Jasmyne Jade Hill
articles.summary: Microsoft's Copilot, OpenAI's ChatGPT, and Apple Intelligence are integrating 'Agentic AI' and 'Model Context Protocol (MCP)', enabling AI systems to operate autonomously across various platforms. These integrations aim to provide seamless workflows and proactive suggestions, but lack complete governance frameworks raising questions about accountability and security. MCP facilitates connections between AI models and apps allowing for complex multi-step tasks.

articles.title: 41 Clever Products For Those Who Value Efficiency
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Puracy launched an enzyme-based spot cleaner. Monday Haircare introduced Dry Shampoo with gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Dawn released Platinum Powerwash Dish Spray. Plaud launched an AI voice recorder and notes generator. Bublue introduced BuHybrid L6 robot vacuum for pool cleaning.

articles.title: âš¡Check POCO M7 4G Price, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: POCO launched the POCO M7 4G, a new budget smartphone, in the global market. The POCO M7 4G features a 7,000mAh battery with fast charging and a 144Hz refresh rate display.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Doesn't Actually Cost $2,000
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a thinner and lighter foldable phone featuring a brighter 8-inch display and on-device Galaxy AI. Verizon is offering discounts up to 55% off with a new unlimited data plan and eligible trade-in, while Samsung's trade-in program can reduce the price by half.

articles.title: Best online beauty retailers to shop in the UK for all your needs
articles.author: Saskia Kemsley
articles.summary: Space NK opened a new store on Oxford Street, demonstrating the continued importance of in-person shopping experiences. Customers can now utilize their Space NK Ndulge rewards both online and in physical stores.

articles.title: What to shop this weekendâ€“ new-in picks including 'Capri in a bottle' perfume
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Oliver Bonas introduced Lemon Sporty Socks, offering a playful twist to outfits. Habitat launched the Scandi Lohko Armchair, designed for style and comfort. M&S released a Polka Dot Dress, suitable for day-to-evening wear. Modern Chemistry at Boots launched Restore Moisturiser, which hydrates and smooths skin. Kayali presented Capri in a Bottle EDP, a gourmand scent. Prada Beauty at Selfridges launched Banana Yellow Balm, providing 24-hour hydration. Supergoop! at Sephora introduced Glow Screen in Golden Hour, a glow-boosting sunscreen.

articles.title: 39 Things That Come Highly Recommended From Reviewers
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil. The shave oil shares the same whipped vanilla, musk, and soft caramel scent as the Eos "cashmere" body lotion. Reviewers indicate the shave oil helps avoid razor burn and get an extra close shave.

articles.title: How generative AI is expanding possibilities
articles.summary: Generative AI is being used to reshape product prototyping. This technology also enables training simulations and hyper-personalized marketing.

articles.title: New Saga Season 1 Episode 8 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
articles.author: Ayesha Zafar
articles.summary: Crunchyroll is set to stream the new episode 'New Saga Season 1 Episode 8' on August 20, 2025, at 12:28 p.m. PT and 3:28 p.m. ET. The streaming service provides both free and premium membership plans for watching East Asian anime, manga, and entertainment.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: Johnston's Marianne Rose Scott shines at Iowa State Fair
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile invested billions to improve their mobile network from big cities to small towns. Ookla Speedtest recognized T-Mobile as America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: 25 Target Products That'll Improve Your Everday Routine
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: Google introduced a Nest smart thermostat that allows users to control home temperature remotely and via voice control. Mad Rabbit launched a vegan tattoo brightening balm stick designed to keep tattoos looking fresh and vibrant. Our Place introduced an Always Pan 2.0, a ceramic nonstick pan that can substitute for many kitchen items.

articles.title: Major Amazon leak suggests an impressive cheaper Kindle is on the way
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Amazon is reportedly testing a new, smaller, and potentially lower-cost color Kindle prototype, possibly named 'Kindle Petit Color'. Leaked images suggest that Amazon is exploring new E Ink display technologies to improve its Kindle lineup, and the new color display is 'much better' than the current Colorsoft. The prototype also features customizable icon colors and a feature that changes the text color based on reading progress.

articles.title: Small World Marketing Empowers Langley Businesses with Advanced SEO Solutions
articles.summary: Small World Marketing, a digital marketing agency, helps Langley businesses rank higher with advanced SEO strategies. They offer customized SEO strategies that deliver measurable improvements in search rankings, traffic, and customer engagement. The company's approach includes local optimization, AI-driven keyword targeting, and high-impact content development.

articles.title: There's no reason to make a PS6 or a next gen Xbox - Reader's Feature
articles.summary: Rumors are swirling about the upcoming PlayStation 6 and the potential offerings of the Nintendo Switch 2. Sony also released a PS5 Pro model which can run more games at 4k and a steady 60 frames per second, while toying with some ray-tracing. The article questions whether these new consoles will provide truly innovative experiences compared to their predecessors.

articles.title: I swapped my foundation for Aldi's Â£4.99 tinted moisturiser and my skin looked incredible
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Aldi offers a product as an alternative to Max Factor Facefinity foundation.  The Aldi product, available in six shades, provides good coverage and a lightweight feel, holding up well throughout the day. It's positioned as a potential foundation swap, despite not providing a dewy glow.

articles.title: Top 8 body washes at Myntra fwd that gives you a revived and refreshed look; Keep smelling great
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Foxtale has launched De-Tan Brightening Body Wash, targeting tan removal and skin brightening. DOT & KEY introduced Cica & Salicylic Daily Exfoliating Shower Gel for acne control and exfoliation. MCaffeine released Blueberry Blast Body Wash, an antioxidant-rich formula for skin nourishment and revitalization. Deconstruct launched Salicylic Acid Body Wash to target body acne and clogged pores. Aqualogica has unveiled Glow Squishy Shower Gel infused with fruit extracts for a radiant finish. TNW The Natural Wash introduced Cranberry Cream Body Wash with cranberries for deep cleansing and moisturization. Chemist at Play offers a Set of Hydrating Body Wash for gentle cleansing and moisture replenishment. MCaffeine provides Daily Cleanse & Moisturize Kit includes body wash and moisturizer for hydrated skin.

articles.title: 39 Satisfying Products That Deliver On Their Promises
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products and services in the beauty and personal care sectors. Sol De Janeiro launched its Bum Bum Cream, while Cosrx offers a hydrating snail mucin essence. Mielle introduced its Rosemary Mint oil for hair growth, and Philips Norelco released its OneBlade electric hair trimmer. Other new products include I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder, Catrice's Under Eye Brightener, Anua's pore-clearing cleansing oil, One/Size's blurring setting powder, Briotech's anti-bacterial spray, Truremedy Naturals' Remedy Tea Tree Oil body wash, Essence's Volume Booster Lash Primer, and NYX Brow Glue.

articles.title: Glossybox review: I tried the affordable beauty subscription
articles.author: Sophie Bates
articles.summary: Glossybox offers a monthly beauty subscription box for Â£12.50-Â£13.50, featuring five products valued around Â£50. Glossybox is launching its 2025 Advent calendar in September for Â£75, containing products worth Â£624. The limited-edition Summer Bag, containing Â£142 worth of beauty products for Â£45, is available on both the Glossybox and the Lookfantastic website.

articles.title: 20 Waterproof Lovehoney Toys That Will Make Waves
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Lovehoney and Womanizer have introduced a range of new sex toys, including clitoral stimulators, vibrators, dildos, and masturbators, each featuring unique designs, functions, and technologies. These products cater to diverse preferences for solo and partnered play, with features like air pulsing, G-spot stimulation, and app control, and are sold at varying price points.

articles.title: Dragon Ball Sparking ZERO: Switch 2 Specs, Frame Rate & Resolution
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2's performance details are revealed for Dragon Ball Sparking Zero, showing 810p/30fps docked on the new console versus 720p/30fps on the original Switch. The Switch 2 prioritizes optimized scalability and consistent experiences, using dynamic resolution scaling and HDR support to improve visual fidelity without overhauling the game engine.

articles.title: Hershey creates first-ever new candy shape for Halloween
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Hershey has launched its first-ever candy innovation for its chocolate brand. This launch signifies a new product introduction from Hershey.

articles.title: Amazon to shut down Appstore on Android devices after 14 years: Here's what it means ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Amazon will discontinue its Appstore service for non-Amazon Android devices on August 20, 2025. The Appstore, launched in 2011, served as an alternative to Google Play and Apple's App Store.

articles.title: Google releases more teasers for the Pixel 10 event, and photo AI features heavily
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google is teasing its upcoming foldable device. The teaser highlights AI features and mentions special guests. This suggests an imminent product launch or introduction by Google.
